oProgressBarModel.setPropertyValue( "ProgressValue", 500 )
ThisComponent.CurrentController.ActiveSheet = ThisComponent.sheets.getByName("A_Basic_Info") thisComponent.CurrentController.Frame.ContainerWindow.Enable= True End Sub
